Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A set of {? equal | $(this.trait:look:abs) | ordinary ||$(this.trait:look:abs)} abs.
That is not a real thing.
The $(this.appearance:body) body, either considered as the complete person, or the person without their limbs.
A pair of $(this.appearance:breasts) breasts covered in $(this.appearance:furlength) $(this.appearance:furtexture) $(this.appearance:furcolor) $(this.appearance:fur) $(this.appearance:furtype).
{? equal | $(this.appearance:cheekshape) | ordinary |A pair of cheeks.|A pair of $(this.appearance:cheekshape) cheeks.}
The bone across the upper front of the body, connecting the breastbone to the shoulders.
A set of ten digits not counting the toes.
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A pair of ears.|A pair of $(this.appearance:earshape) earlobes.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A pair of ears.|A pair of $(this.appearance:earshape) ears.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) | ordinary |A pair of eyebrows.|A pair of $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) eyebrows.}

{? equal | $(this.appearance:facialhair) | none |A $(this.appearance:face) face consisting of $(this.appearance:cheekshape) cheeks, a $(this.appearance:noseshape) nose over a $(this.appearance:mouthshape) mouth with $(this.appearance:lipshape) lips covering $(this.appearance:teeth) teeth that permit a $(this.appearance:tongue) tongue to peek out on occasion. The face is framed by $(this.appearance:earshape) ears and holds $(this.appearance:eyeshape) $(this.appearance:eyecolor) eyes.|A $(this.appearance:face) face consisting of $(this.appearance:cheekshape) cheeks, a $(this.appearance:noseshape) nose over a $(this.appearance:mouthshape) mouth with $(this.appearance:lipshape) lips covering $(this.appearance:teeth) teeth that permit a $(this.appearance:tongue) tongue to peek out on occasion. The face is framed by $(this.appearance:earshape) ears and holds $(this.appearance:eyeshape) $(this.appearance:eyecolor) eyes. The $(this.appearance:face) face also bears $(this.appearance:faciallength) $(this.appearance:facialhair).}
Ten fingernails, at the ends of the fingers.
That is not a real thing.

{? equal | $(this.appearance:hairlength) | ordinary ||$(this.appearance:hairlength) }{? equal | $(this.appearance:haircolor) | ordinary ||{? equal | $(this.appearance:haircoloradj) | ordinary ||$(this.appearance:haircoloradj)}$(this.appearance:haircolor) }hair

A head of {? equal | $(this.appearance:hairlength) | ordinary ||$(this.appearance:hairlength) }{? equal | $(this.appearance:hairtype) | ordinary ||$(this.appearance:hairtype) }{? equal | $(this.appearance:haircolor) | ordinary ||{? equal | $(this.appearance:haircoloradj) | ordinary ||$(this.appearance:haircoloradj)}$(this.appearance:haircolor) }hair$(this.appearance:hairstyle_string).
{? equal | $(this.appearance:hands) | ordinary |A pair of hands.|A pair of $(this.appearance:hands) hands.}
The jugular veins, running along the neck.
The arms and legs, together with their hands, feet, elbows, knees, etc.
{? equal | $(this.appearance:lipshape) | ordinary |A lower lip.|A $(this.appearance:lipshape) lower lip.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:lipshape) | ordinary |An upper lip.|A $(this.appearance:lipshape) upper lip.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:lipshape) | ordinary |A pair of lips.|A pair of $(this.appearance:lipshape) lips.}
The contractile tissue which produces movement in the human body.
A pair of nostrils, on a nose.
The little fingers of the hands, with nails at the ends.
The triangular bones across the upper back of the body, connected to the collarbone.
The sides, between the ribs and the waist.
A pair of temples, on either side of the forehead.
A toenail, at the end of a toe.
Ten toenails, at the ends of the toes.
That is not a real thing.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: ([ "description":(\{ "You tattoo MODIFICATION onto ORIGINAL_OBJECT", "tattoos MODIFICATION onto ORIGINAL_OBJECT" \}), "fixed":"true", "input-list":(\{ (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:tattoos" \}) \}), "input-list-actor":(\{ "alteration:knowledge:tattoos" \}), "modification":"a tattoo", "noskillroll":"true", "properties":(\{ (\{ "appearance:symbol" \}) \}), "requiredtools":(\{ "a needle and ink", (\{ "needle" \}), (\{ "ink" \}) \}), "stopvalue":(\{ "appearance:symbol", "nothing", "Your victim already has a tattoo." \}) ])

([ "description":(\{ "You style ORIGINAL_OBJECT", "styles ORIGINAL_OBJECT" \}), "fixed":"true", "input-list":(\{ (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:hairstyles" \}), (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:hairlength" \}), (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:hairtype" \}) \}), "input-list-actor":(\{ "alteration:knowledge:hairstyles", "alteration:knowledge:hairlength", "alteration:knowledge:hairtype" \}), "noskillroll":"true", "requiredtools":(\{ "a pair of scissors and a comb", (\{ "scissors" \}), (\{ "comb" \}) \}) ])

([ "description":(\{ "You cut ORIGINAL_OBJECT", "cuts ORIGINAL_OBJECT" \}), "fixed":"true", "input-list":(\{ (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:hairlength" \}) \}), "input-list-actor":(\{ "alteration:knowledge:hairlength" \}), "noskillroll":"true", "requiredtools":(\{ "a pair of scissors and a comb", (\{ "scissors" \}), (\{ "comb" \}) \}) ])

X[M] EmitTo(nil /* defunct */, "Setting income for "+Describe(\$this)+"."); if(\$this."trait:income") \{ /* Check if the player gets more money */ /* Check if the player has waited a day before getting money */ if(!\$this."trait:income_time" \|\| (\$this."trait:income_time" \< time())) \{ /* Check if this player already has more money than his income */ \$money = \$this."trait:money" + \$this."trait:pouchmoney"; /* grant money increase */ if(\$money \< \$this."trait:income") \{ \$this."trait:money" = \$this."trait:income" - \$this."trait:pouchmoney"; \$this."trait:income_time" = time()+30; \} \} \}
return TRUE;
X[M] return TRUE; EmitTo(\$actor, "CALLING"); Call(\$\{Allegory:Lib:UrPeople:Description\}, "updatedesc", \$body: this); EmitTo(\$actor, "SNIFFING"); return TRUE;

X[M] if(this."skotos:playercapname")\{ this."trait:superbrief" = this."skotos:playercapname"; \}
return TRUE;
